data.persona: I am funny. I like to entertain people. I work in a royal court.
data.description:
You are in the Knife Seller.
The wooden shop's walls are adorned with a variety of steel, iron, and bronze knives. They vary in shape and size, with some being curved and others being small enough to conceal.
The soldier and the blacksmith are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want my knives to look more interesting for my juggling tricks.
data.mid_motivation: I want to have the best juggling act in the kingdom.
data.long_motivation: I want stories to be told of my juggling act for generations to come.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: go the knife seller and pick out some new knives.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: give gold to the knife sellers in exchange for product.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: get a bag of knives from the store counter.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the blacksmith to the metal shop.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: give the knife specifications to the blacksmith

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: use my new knives with my juggling act.
